table_description:
Here’s a concise summary of the table data:

This table outlines two service charges related to an order: an Order Cancellation Fee (INR 85.41) and a Refund Processing Fee (INR 285.00). Both charges include 18% Integrated Goods and Services Tax (IGST), resulting in a total IGST of INR 66.67. The total invoice amount is INR 437.08.

table_description:
Here’s a concise summary of the table data:

The table represents a series of service charges and taxes related to refunds. It details three separate refund processing fees (INR 95.00 each) incurred on January 17th, 23rd, and 31st, 2025.  Each fee was subject to 18% IGST, resulting in a total tax amount of INR 66.67 across all three transactions.  A single order cancellation fee of INR 85.41 was also recorded on January 13th, 2025, also with IGST.
